description: This file defines the Express router for team-related API endpoints, including routes for listing, creating, updating, archiving teams, and managing team members. It also contains Swagger API documentation annotations.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all accessible teams.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new team.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve details of a specific team by ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles PATCH requests to update a team's details.

methods.name: archive
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to archive (soft delete) a team.

methods.name: listMembers
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list members of a specific team.

methods.name: addMember
methods.description: Handles POST requests to add a member to a team.

methods.name: removeMember
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a member from a team.

methods.name: changeMemberRole
methods.description: Handles PATCH requests to change a team member's role.
